description:
For colder, wetter days, this full-zip jacket is designed to move with you as you paddle your board out through the fog. Zippered pockets hold snacks or your phone, and an innovative port in the back of the hood lets your ponytail swing free.

  • Polyester and spandex face fabric is bonded to 0.5mm petroleum-free neoprene
  • Nylon and polyester lining feels nice against your skin
  • Eco-stretch neoprene is limestone-based and designed for comfort and warmth
  • Snug fitting 3-panel hood has a ponytail hole in the back and a drawcord adjustment
  • UPF 50+ protects you from UV rays
  • Flat-lock stitched seams throughout
  • Zippered side pockets
  • Curved seam detail on upper chest and side panels
name: Level Six Sombrio SUP Hoody - Women's
